block.p: THOMPSON-Ruth. Age 91, of Greenwich, CT, died Friday, October 20. Sister of Jean T. Makepece of Greenwich, aunt of Marilyn Makepece and William Lloyd Makepece. A memorial service will be held Wednesday, at 3 pm, in Second Congregational Church, 139 E. Putnam Ave, Greenwich. Memorial contributions may be made to the Nature Conservancy or the Greenwich Hospital, 5 Perryridge Rd, Greenwich, CT 06830.
